name: Super Bubble Shooting
description:
Shoot and pop all the colored balls in this fun FREE game!Match 3 balls to blast and clear all the bubbles on the screen, complete the missions and win coins & awesome rewards.It's the classic and most addictive matching game with crush bubble.Work your way through all the different challenges and puzzles, solve the brain teasers and win levels.

Features
* Blast and explode bubbles in this cool bubble shooter game.
* Drop and smash all bubbles and balls to clear the board.
* Sharpen your color-matching skills.
